Went on recommendation of our hotel desk.  Great selection of cold tapas in the case in front of you (all on slices of bread). Highlights were white anchovies with olives, creamy caviar with an anchovy, jamon with Camembert, tuna salad with shredded cheese.  You can also order hot ones.  Also fun is that plates of hot tapas come out of the kitchen and the server brings it down the line to tempt you - various eggy things, blood sausage..... You could just sit here and stuff yourself forever.  All tapas are 1.65 Euro, so great value if you can just stop!  Great place!
